rules_text:
Deathtouch
At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent discarded a card this turn, you get {V} [i](a research counter)[/i].
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have ten or more {V}, you may put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
notes: Whenever you sacrifice another creature during your turn —> Whenever a player discards one or more cards — Flavor reasons, reanimate your graveyard —> reanimate any graveyard
